result.title: Help with Petr#113B
result.content: Hi, I tried to solve this problem. I used two vectors to store occurrences of both prefix and suffix; the problem was how to indicate that two sub-strings are different I looked for other submissions i notice that they used a map and a long long number to have this. my question is: wouldn't we have an overflow? how can we be sure that two different sub strings wouldn't have the same number as a result of overflow?
